    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BoardComponent
    Represents a Noticeboard in the GUI.
    BoardSelector
    A utility GUI component, spawns a combo box attached to a BoardComponent in order to change the displayed Noticeboard.
    BoardView
    The BoardView, displays the logged User's Noticeboards and enables the user to add, modify and delete Noticeboards and their ToDos and to use the advanced ToDo search functions.
    Controller
    The Controller, acts as an interface between the App's state and the GUI
    DatabaseConnection
    The DatabaseConnection, acts as an interface between the Database's state and the Data Access Object classes.
    GUI
    The GUI, controls which View is displayed.
    GUIView
    A common interface for all the views of the GUI.
    HomeView
    The HomeView, displays a form where a User can sign up or log in.
    ListComponent
    The ListComponent GUI component, displays a list of String elements.
    Noticeboard
    A Noticeboard in the model.
    NoticeboardDAO
    Manages the fundamental Database operations for Noticeboard objects.
    NoticeboardDTO
    A Noticeboard Data Transfer Object.
    NoticeboardForm
    A class that spawns a Form to insert information about a Noticeboard
    PostgresNoticeboardDAO
    PostgreSQL specific implementation of the NoticeboardDAO interface.
    PostgresSharingDAO
    PostgreSQL specific implementation of the SharingDAO interface.
    PostgresToDoDAO
    PostgreSQL specific implementation of the ToDoDAO interface.
    PostgresUserDAO
    PostgreSQL specific implementation of the UserDAO interface.
    SharingDAO
    Manages the fundamental Database operations for the sharing of ToDo between system users.
    ToDo
    A ToDo in the model.
    ToDoComponent
    Represents a ToDo in the GUI.
    ToDoDAO
    Manages the fundamental Database operations for ToDo objects.
    ToDoDTO
    A ToDo Data Transfer Object.
    ToDoForm
    A class that spawns a Form to insert information about a ToDo
    UnknownPostgresException
    Used to signal that an unexpected SQLError exception arised from an invoked method.
    User
    A User in the model.
    UserDAO
    Manages the fundamental Database operations for User objects.
    UserDTO
    A User Data Transfer Object.
